name: As An Immortal, I Only Practice Forbidden Arts
author: 九夏动漫
content: Chen Qi, Who Is Immortal, gains life with each passing second, but in the dog-eat-dog world of cultivation, his immortality proves futile. Seeking to master the arts of immortality and join the Fallen Immortal Sect, he unexpectedly finds himself in a nursing home where four masters, each physically impaired from practicing forbidden techniques, reside. Yet, for Chen Qi, with his unique abilities, it’s a seamless transition…Original Webtoon
